sioux-falls.meetingHighlights: Largest fellowship in the state with meetings across downtown and suburbs, regular speaker nights, and active newcomer programs.
sioux-falls.transitInfo: Sioux Area Metro (SAM) provides local bus service; Sioux Falls Regional Airport for regional travel.

rapid-city.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Rapid, East Rapid, Canyon Lake
rapid-city.meetingHighlights: Meetings serving the Black Hills region with a mix of downtown and small-town groups and seasonal tourist-area meetings.
rapid-city.transitInfo: Rapid City Rapid Ride provides local transit; regional airports and highways connect to the Black Hills.

pierre.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday attendance and community-focused groups.
pierre.transitInfo: Local transit and regional highways; small regional airport for limited service.

aberdeen.meetingHighlights: Regional meetings with steady community attendance and several evening groups.
aberdeen.transitInfo: Aberdeen Transit operates local services; regional highways provide access to nearby cities.

brookings.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meetings with student-friendly schedules and steady community participation.
brookings.transitInfo: Local transit and regional roads; Brookings Regional Airport for limited service.
